scripts.build:linux: GOOS=linux GOARCH=amd64 go build -o dist/kn-workflow-linux-amd64 cmd/main.go
scripts.build:darwin: GO111MODULE=on GOOS=darwin GOARCH=amd64 go build -o dist/kn-workflow-darwin-amd64 cmd/main.go
scripts.build:win32: GO111MODULE=on GOOS=windows GOARCH=amd64 go build -o dist/kn-workflow-windows-amd64.exe cmd/main.go
